Comment.value:
This is the non dispellable effect.

Use one of the following FX numbers as this creature's tag.   As an example,
if you wanted a shimmer on the floor effect in your map you would give this 
creature a tag of 0  (that's a zero folks)

If you want an Area FX, put an "a" before the Area Effect number, as listed below. Example: to create a red fog, give a tag of "a3"

If you wish to apply the effect on a different location than this creature's, create a waypoint there and tag it: "FXWP_" + the tag of the creature. This is expecially useful to create effects on "non-walkable" locations. Visual FX work fine with this, but Area FX seem to be "cut" around non-walkable locations Play with it. Example: to create green plants on a table, give the FX Maker a tag of "2", put a waypoint on the table (or wherever you want), and give it a tag of "FXWP_2".

FX Number       Description

0               shimmer on floor
1               blob of sheer darkness
2               green plant on floor
3               green intricate glowy circle
4               sphere with wiggly texture
7               3d spherical purple and white whirly flying dots
8               white and blue twirling cone
9               slight blue shimmer on floor
10              purple shimmer on floor
11              sound but no graphic
12              sound but no graphic
13              cloud of blue and purple dots and eyeballs
14              sound but no graphic
15              sound but no graphic
16              dancing blue dots in cylindrical formation
17              3d spider web formations
73              plays sound but not graphic
82              field of white dots and white dancing cylinders
138             circular lightning effect on floor
147             circle of fire
153             faint blue light
154             faint xxxx light
